edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer.io
Class HierarchySketcher

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer.io.HierarchySketcher

public class HierarchySketcher
extends java.lang.Object

The HierarchySketcher is responsible for combing a directory hierarchy and indexing the available MSMs and their relative relationship. The layout of the hierarchy is important to making this work properly: When prompted users should select a FOLDER that contains a selection of FOLDERS where each folder that participates in the hierarchy contains: > a file that starts with the exact characters "tProb" . If this file has the extension ".mtx" the sketcher assumes it is a sparse matrix file; otherwise, it assumes it is a dense matrix file. > a file that starts with the exact cahracters "MacroMapping" which contains a newline-delimited mapping of each microstate to some macrostate in the model represented by tProb (i.e. in this macrostate model) The MacroMapping file can not exist in the model in the hierarchy with the largest number of states
